name: Calendula Organic Soap
description:
My new collection of organic soaps include lemongrass, lavender with oats, calendula, and coffee. Each bar weighs approximately 4-5 ounces, is made with almost entirely organic ingredients in small batches, and is very gently bevelled on the edges just to take the sharpness off. My soap is soothing, invigorating, cleansing, and exfoliating depending on the variety. All of them are good for you, have subtle (not overpowering scents), and are long lasting. I'll be adding additional soaps over the next few months. Give them a try and I'm pretty sure you'll be very pleased.

My calendula organic soap is made of olive, coconut, castor oils and shea butter -- all organic. I add organic orange and tea tree oils, and gently press some calendula flowers on top while it's in the mold. Just so you know, the flowers don't wash off, but become beautifully embedded in the bar as you use it. This is great for bathing and general use.

name: Coffee Organic Soap
description:
My new collection of organic soaps include lemongrass, lavender with oats, calendula, and coffee. Each bar weighs approximately 4-5 ounces, is made with almost entirely organic ingredients in small batches, and is very gently bevelled on the edges just to take the sharpness off. My soap is soothing, invigorating, cleansing, and exfoliating depending on the variety. All of them are good for you, have subtle (not overpowering scents), and are long lasting. I'll be adding additional soaps over the next few months. Give them a try and I'm pretty sure you'll be very pleased.

Coffee Organic Soap is interesting. It's made of organic olive, coconut, castor oils, organic shea butter, finely ground organic coffee, brewed coffee, ground walnut hulls, and organic cinnamon. It is terrific at removing dirt, grease, paint and cooking odors (garlic, fish, etc.). It's gently exfoliating, but soothing with the addition of shea butter. Men really like this soap as its scent is mild and its effects are powerful.

name: Lavender Oats Organic Soap
description:
My new collection of organic soaps include lemongrass, lavender with oats, calendula, and coffee. Each bar weighs approximately 4-5 ounces, is made with almost entirely organic ingredients in small batches, and is very gently bevelled on the edges just to take the sharpness off. My soap is soothing, invigorating, cleansing, and exfoliating depending on the variety. All of them are good for you, have subtle (not overpowering scents), and are long lasting. I'll be adding additional soaps over the next few months. Give them a try and I'm pretty sure you'll be very pleased.

Lavender Oats Organic Soap is made with organic olive, coconut, castor oils, organic shea butter, organic lavender essential oil, and organic colloidal oats, saponified sodium hydroxide, and distilled water.

name: Lemongrass Organic Soap
description:
My new collection of organic soaps include lemongrass, lavender with oats, calendula, and coffee. Each bar weighs approximately 4-5 ounces, is made with almost entirely organic ingredients in small batches, and is very gently bevelled on the edges just to take the sharpness off. My soap is soothing, invigorating, cleansing, and exfoliating depending on the variety. All of them are good for you, have subtle (not overpowering scents), and are long lasting. I'll be adding additional soaps over the next few months. Give them a try and I'm pretty sure you'll be very pleased.

Lemongrass soap contains organic olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil and shea butter -- all organic. The organic essential oils are lemongrass and litsea. I add some ground olive leaf powder. Distilled water and saponified sodium hydroxide complete the ingredient list.  Great for both the kitchen and bath.

name: Warm Red Diamond Days Ornament
description: I love this piece -- the thick red wool of the background makes me smile. It measures 7" high y 3.5" wide, so is best for a large tree or can be used on a door or a small wall space.

name: Small Angel with Dark Red Shoes
description: This smaller angel measures 9" high by 6.5" wide. It has a muslin sleeve for hanging and a yellow calico backing. Perfect for wall or table display.

name: Angel with Blue Shoes
description: This is one of the tree angel mats I've made this fall. I've reduced the heavenly part of the theme to curvy lines coming down from some celestial place. The binding is a riotous red, in keeping with the spirit of winter holidays. This one measures 15" high by 9" wide, has a muslin sleeve and dowel for wall display. It'd look great on a table as well.

name: Lots of Circles Round Ornament
description: I've made a long series of round ornaments. Perfect for the tree, as a gift, a tag for a present, or on a small wall area in your home. Measuring approximately 3.75" in diameter, they are all backed with a round of light gold wool stamped with my initials and the date. The backing is sewn on with varied colors of embroidery floss in a blanket stitch and there is a strip of wool hanger.

name: Small Oval Tree Ornament
description: This small oval ornament measures 6.5" by 6" and is backed with calico fabric. It has a wool strip for hanging. Perfect for a small wall area that needs some holiday touch. It's a one-of-a-kind.

name: Silver Grey Diamond Days Ornament
description: This is a diamond theme with a green background of varied wools and a central diamond edged in dark red. It measures approximately 7" high by 3.5" wide, has a wood strip for hanging, and is backed with a flowered calico. This is a one of a kind ornament.

name: Rabbit with Floating Flowers
description: A small rabbit snuggled in the deep grass. Above her are floating flowers of bright pinks. I like to play with the place where grass meets sky since when you observe rabbits and other small creatures, the horizon is not so clear. This rug measures 10.5" high by 13.5" wide. It has a very exuberant binding of calico on the back. It will be fitted with a muslin sleeve and dowel for displaying on the wall.

name: Pheasant Eye Round Ornament
description: I've made a long series of round ornaments. Perfect for the tree, as a gift, a tag for a present, or on a small wall area in your home. Measuring approximately 3.75" in diameter, they are all backed with a round of light gold wool stamped with my initials and the date. The backing is sewn on with varied colors of embroidery floss in a blanket stitch and there is a strip of wool hanger. To see the back, please check out Ornament S.

I've made a long series of round ornaments. Perfect for the tree, as a gift, a tag for a present, or on a small wall area in your home. description: I've made a long series of round ornaments. Perfect for the tree, as a gift, a tag for a present, or on a small wall area in your home. name: Angel Mat
description: This angel mat continues to explore the more simplified curved lines in the sky. I have the perfect wool for wings as it turns out that I use here. It measures 11.5" high by 8" wide, has a light blue flowered binding, and a muslin sleeve and dowel for hanging.

name: Small Tree Ornament
description: This small ornament (5" in diameter) is wonderful on the tree or the wall. It will make a perfect gift. It's backed with calico and is one of a kind.

name: Diamond Days Green with Red-Edged Diamond
description: This is a diamond theme with a green background of varied wools and a central diamond edged in bright red. It measures approximately 7" high by 3.5" wide, has a wood strip for hanging, and is backed with a flowered calico. This is a one of a kind ornament.

name: Silvery Diamond Days Four Squares
description: This is a diamond theme with a reddish background, central silvery diamond, and four red squares. It measures approximately 7" high by 3.5" wide, has a wood strip for hanging, and is backed with a flowered calico. This is a one of a kind ornament.

name: Big Silvery Diamond Days Ornament
description: This is a diamond theme with a green and red plaid background and central silvery diamond. It measures approximately 7" high by 3.5" wide, has a wood strip for hanging, and is backed with a flowered calico. This is a one of a kind ornament.

name: Dark Green Diamond Days Ornament
description: This is a diamond theme with a green background of varied wools and a central diamond edged in bright red. It measures approximately 7" high by 3.5" wide, has a wood strip for hanging, and is backed with a flowered calico. This is a one of a kind ornament.

name: Candy Stripes Multi-Color Center Ornament
description: This is a candy stripe theme with various holiday colors in the central area and on the border. It measures approximately 7" high by 3.5" wide, has a wood strip for hanging, and is backed with a flowered calico. This is a one of a kind ornament.

name: Pink Angel
description:
The Night Horse kind of spun off into a small angel with a pink dress, holding a torch toward a sky that's very like the almost November sky we're having these days. This small mat measures 11.5" high by 7" wide.
It's bound with a blue calico, and hangs on the wall from a muslin sleeve and dowel.

name: Night Horse
description: All the dark blue turned this horse rug into one about night. Lately I've loved placing a small bush in front of the horse. This rug has a bright, sweet bird riding along. The rug measures 16" high by 20" wide. It has a flowered blue calico binding, a muslin sleeve and dowel for wall display, and a handmade stamped label sewn on the back.

name: 4Squares - Spring
description: This small study rug made me think of the floor of the forest in Spring. The light green and quiet pinks are colors you find at that time of year. I like the way color studies move from just that to a deeper exploration of emotional memories. This rug is small -- it measures 10" square. It has a quiet tan binding on the back. It will be fitted with a muslin sleeve and dowel for wall display.

name: Sweet Friendship
description: This is a rug that follows the traditional theme of two cats, happy as clams, sitting together. It's made of hand-dyed and as-is wools on linen. It has a muslin sleeve and a dowel for displaying on the wall. It measures 17" high by 24" wide.

name: Bright Tulip
description: This is an exciting small mat. Its bright red stripes are vivid against the yellow of the petals. It measures in irregular fashion approximately 9" high by 10" wide. The back binding is a lively red and cream calico that makes the back nearly as exciting as the front.

name: Brown Horse
description: This rug of a gentle brown horse is 10.5"h by 16"w. The binding on the back is a riotous reproduction fabric.

name: Tough Cat
description: This is a cat that comes and goes at will. One tip of an ear seems to be missing! It measures 10" high by 16" wide and has a dowel in a muslin sleeve on the back for hanging it on the wall.

name: Pink Tulip
description: This is a rug that I left before finishing a few years ago, and discovered when I organized some things in my studio. Its abandoned quality -- odd colors in the border, changing colors in the lamb tongue shapes at the bottom -- make this a rug that reflects the feelings we have as we wait for Spring. It measures 16" high by 12" wide.

name: February Scotties
description: The Scottie rug theme is one of the few that I seem to return to time and again. I think it's because of all the Scottie dog lovers! The background, so far, is made of a variety of tans that create the kind of ruckus feel that real Scotties have a habit of creating. The dogs are connected and spirited. I love making dog rugsI've made a Lab, an English spaniel, and many Scotties. This rug measure 20" high by 29" wide and has a muslin sleeve with a dowel to display on the wall.

name: Two Tulips Four Hearts
description: This large rug, measuring 30" high by 25" wide, is a take-off on the 19th century theme of flowers in a strange vase surrounded by a border with hearts. The wide border on this rug has stripes of multi-colored blues and small curvy hearts at each corner. It's a statement rug, large enough to make an impact in even a big room.

name: Heart of Gold
description: The gold of this heart rug is made of a stripedyellow and off-white stripe. The heart is pure gold I always think of my favorite, Neil Young, when I look at this rug. It measures 11" high by 15" wide and is complete with a muslin sleeve and dowel for display on the wall. The motif of a heart with circles created not by a circular line, but by radiating straight lines, is a wonderful old idea that always seems to work well in a rug. I make a lot of heart rugs and they go to all kinds of people sweethearts, little girls who like all heart-related things, and people celebrating weddings and anniversaries.

name: Four Squares
description: For a small mat, this is a powerful geometric image. It's great on the table or wall, and has a muslin sleeve with a dowel for hanging. It measures approximately 9" high by 9" wide and is made of hand-dyed and as-is wools on a linen backing. Note the calico binding on the back. It makes the back as interesting as the front!

name: Three
description: Three is a large rug with several levels of activity. The back is bound with bias tape fabric. It's 32"high by 24"wide and has a muslin sleeve and dowel for display on the wall. It's great on the floor too!

name: Sweet Bush Pony
description: Sweet Bush Pony combines some of my favorite ideas: a dappled grey pony and a small bush that makes the pony look really out of normal range. I like the pink background. Sometimes the sky out my back window is pale pink and it's nice to put it in a rug. This rug measures 20" high by 30" wide.

name: Four Stars
description: This rug is great to get out during July to celebrate our country's spirit. It's 20" high by 26" wide and has, as you can see, an uneven edge, which I like a lot. I love flags, but they are nearly always so perfectly rectangularthis rug breaks with that tradition. It's made of hand-dyed and as-is wools, with muted colors that meld together well. It comes complete with muslin sleeve and dowel, so that it can be displayed in a prominent place in a country home for city dwellers on vacation during the hot months of summer.

name: Tribal
description: Tribal is a long runner measuring 12" by 57". It can be displayed on the wall, but probably more likely will be used on the floor. I like to place them at the foot or side of a bed or in the upstairs hall. It's made of hand-dyed and as-is wools on a linen foundation. Please click on the numbers below the rug to see two detail views of Tribal.

name: Waterblue Diamonds
description: Waterblue Diamonds is one of a series of runners where I work from one side to the other rather than plan out the design, even minimally. This runner 11" by 59" and made of hand-dyed and as-is wools on a linen foundation. It's made of left-over wools with some kind of coordination of colors that seems to just happen. This one is about diamonds, while other runners have triangles or varied shapes as their themes.

name: Festive Geometrics
description: This was the first "Right to Left" runner that I made. My original intention was to make a lot of little mats, but I was urged to resist cutting them apart, and make a long runner of somewhat disparate shapes instead and see what happened. This runner measures 13" high by 44" wide. It's made of hand-dyed and as-is wools on linen. All of my runners are great on the floor in a hall or at the foot of a bed, but can also be displayed on the wall (using a dowel in a muslin sleeve), hung either vertically or horizontally, as you please.

name: Crystals
description: Crystals is a long runner (12" high by 43" long) that is perfect for the floor in a hallway, or at the foot of the bed. I often hang mine on the wall. I call these rugs (there are four so far) "Right to Lefts" because I just start at one end and hook to the other. I do them in order to not think or plan, but to let things happen. I find myself making new shapes and new color combinations that are very spontaneous. I can carry these discoveries back to more planned out rugs, making them more exciting as well.
